reviewText: I Really love Korean and Taiwanese  Dramas protect the boss is one of my favorites which is why I purchased it buying these dvds are particularly hard because one you have to find one for region 1 that will play and have decent english subtitles . The quality of the dvds were not bad the subtitles were good but the problem I had was it contained 5disc the last disc would not play at all and made some weird noise in the dvd player like something was rattling and disc 2-4 the video dimmed up and down like the brightness went in and out which was really annoying when watching it was like someone cutting a light on and off. I also purchased oh my.venus which had the same dimming problem the other thing with this set was I'm not sure how they are recorded but at least two of the disc had some coughing noises and what sounded like grunting other than that the dvds were OK I will repurchase hopefully I will get a better quality dvd which will restore my faith and make me want to purchase more titles
Funny and cute romance between young spoiled chaebol and simple determined girl.
Love this drama, because of Kim jaejoong, jisung is also a very good actor
Love this drama! Ji Sung was sooooo funny in it. This drama makes me love him even more as an actor!

I'm happy with the packaging and with the speedy delivery.  Each disc has its own slot.  I'll let you know what I think of the drama once I have an opportunity to watch it.  I purchased this series because I like the acting done by Ji Sung.
Very enjoyable drama.  Cute actors!  Nice packaging.
